title: Celebrating the end of this year's Snowdown

replies.body: Hey, you're very close to a 14-day or permanent ban due to your verbal abuse in games. If you like, I'm happy to review your chat logs with you.
I had to log in just to up vote this <3

Riot,
Can we please receive notifications on whether we are or are not getting the wonderful pleasure of a new skin. This will relieve much of our expectation if we are unaware or not. This will also relieve much of the spam mail you receive about "I didn't get a skin cause noobs are bad at this game and I deserve a skin".
Thank you,
DEATHSREAPERZ28
I SO AGREE. Some of us need some{{summoner:13}} as to if our chances are {{summoner:10}}d or {{summoner:3}}d
LOL, {{summoner:14}}
SMITE BY LYTE
Looks like the original post was deleted :o

Dear Riot,
    I have been playing your game since season one, around the time of Jarvan's release, and I have seen many gifts from your offices to players as a thank you, but rarely do we show appreciation back. I just want to thank you for your amazing service and let you know that I appreciate your efforts. {{item:2010}}
When I saw this comment I enjoyed it and yea people do need to show appreciation back and most do but the ones that don't need to start.

people should start saying that they appreciate riot on other pages and on events that aren't for them giving us free stuff... come on guys we love this game and we can only thank the people who help make it better. RIOT WE LOVE U. i think i stand for almost every league player in existence. I hope to see every one who reads this comment in game, to keep having fun and most of all to experience this great game.
{{summoner:31}} = great mode
See kacey its people like you that i Appreciate Keep it up and if you'd ever want to play my summoner name is OgTornado :3
I swear if anyone complains about their gift I'll throw my homework in the toilet.

Teacher: why don't you have your homework?
You: Noobs complaining about their gifts.
THANKS RIOT YOUR AWESOME
you're
Marry me.
Snowdown *just* finished you impatient brat - chill out.
jesus, you guys are vicious, he was making a joke
Thank YOU for allowing me to chuck Poros last year.

{{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}

thank you riot, just when i thought we weren't going to get any gifts for the holidays, you announce this. this is made us all really happy.
i hope you continue to both, show your that you care about your community, and that you reward players for being positive.
well played riot, and here's to another great year of league.

I hope the following situation doesn't happen because of their nice gift, but I get the feeling it will...

"Wahhhhh my friend got Spirit Guard Udyr(or any expensive skin)  but I only got Lollipoppy{{champion:78}} , no fair Riot you suck boo hoo {{champion:32}}"
What are you talking about? Lollipoppy is love Lollipoppy is life.
Lollipoppy is the face of fear. Lollipoppy is the face of mercilessness. Lollipoppy is the sweetest skin in the game.
Hmmm... nd I dont get anything even after paying 100s of dollars because some trolls got me yelling all game........... I really hate this company.
Last I checked, you're the one controlling your keyboard, not the trolls.

Maybe the fault lies within yourself for becoming enraged at a *team* game, you are always going to run into those people who boil your blood, there is nothing you can do to change those people who play just to push your buttons, enjoy the game, enjoy life =)

doeas mystery gift mean 
        a champion or a skin 
               OR 
          only a skin?
i hope u get my question
It's a mystery.

"you meet the requirements to receive a Mystery Gift (you’re Level 5 or higher and there are at least 10 skins you don’t own)"

Probably a skin because of this requirement.
im hoping its a skin
?????? Many will disagree, but I think skins are pointless. Even if I was a skin buyer, I still would enjoy receiving  a free champion over a skin.

Really? You will eventually own every single champion if you play long enough, but with skins it's very unlikely for someone to obtain all of them...i'd much rather get a free skin. We each have our own opinions i guess which is fine :)
thanks riot you da real MVP
ITS LIKE CHRISTMAS IN JANUARY :D{{summoner:31}}
It IS Christmas in January!
I'd like to poropose (propose) a toast to the {{summoner:30}}
TO KING PORO!!!!!{{summoner:30}}
Thank you and PLS release THE BLOOD MOON SKINS!!!!!!!{{champion:60}}
Hush, child. In due time. {{champion:26}}
That would be awesome if they released bloodmoon skins BEFORE they send us this.
NOW we just need URF back and this will be the best year of League thus far =3.
Riot said URF will indeed be back for the 2015 season.

Now this is a gift. 

**THANK YOU RIOT!!!!**

Sry to be that guy but....

When is the gift delivered and how will we know if we got it?

When you get it you should get a notification once you log on or whenever you're online. :)

It will show which skin you got and likely a message from Riot.
aaaaand now i'm happy I kept in all my rage. so worf
So do the free skins like Alistar, Tristana and Garen count towards the max of 10 skins limit?
